Yes, the resource offers terms for both emergency and medical situations. It includes a "Medical help" section with phrases related to illness, doctors, and hospitals, as well as a "Sprijin de Urgență" (Emergency Support) section for requesting or providing resources.

To find this information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/phrase-book and look for the sections titled "Medical help" and "Sprijin de Urgență".

Yes, specific support initiatives like 'Sprijin de Urgență' and 'Un Acoperiș' are mentioned, along with their purposes. 'Sprijin de Urgență' helps with requesting or providing resources, while 'Un Acoperiș' supports finding or offering temporary accommodation.
